attributes.action: pass a law that citizens can defend themselves without fear of prosecution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If members of the public are threatened in their homes by criminals who have entered illegally with malicious intent, I propose a law that gives those members of the public the right to defend themselves in any way that would prevent injury or further danger to themselves, their family and their property and that the criminals would have no right to prosecute in case of them being harmed by those members of the public defending themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
